org.spf4j.failsafe

Interface RetryPredicate<T,C extends Callable<? extends T>>


  • public interface RetryPredicate<T,C extends Callable<? extends T>>
    A retry predicate.
    Author:
    Zoltan Farkas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RetryPredicate NORETRY
      Simple predicate that does not retry anything.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RetryDecision<T,C> getDecision(T value, C what)
      Get the RetryDecision for the result value returned by Callable C.
      RetryDecision<T,C> getExceptionDecision(Throwable value, C what)
      Get the retryDecision for the exceptional result of a Callable C.

    • Field Detail

      • NORETRY

        static final RetryPredicate NORETRY
        Simple predicate that does not retry anything.

RetryDecision<T,C> getDecision(@Nullable
                                        T value,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        C what)
        Get the RetryDecision for the result value returned by Callable C.
        Parameters:

        what - the operation.

        the retry decision.

      • getExceptionDecision

        @Nonnull
RetryDecision<T,C> getExceptionDecision(@Nonnull
                                                 Throwable value,
                                                 @Nonnull
                                                 C what)
        Get the retryDecision for the exceptional result of a Callable C.
        Parameters:
        value - the Exception instance.
        what - the callable that failed.
        Returns:
        the retry decision.
